Summary: old style rocket and cone with side appendages with lights
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
divs: sighting detailsi was outside having a cigarette and drinking tea around 10 pm. i noticed the object as it cleared the trees across the street. it was the largest thing in the sky closest to me. when i first noticed it i thought it was an airplane. as i stared at it to see if it was an airplane i couldnt figure out why it was travelling so low.and i realized it was not an airplane or a helicopter. as there was no noise of either an airplane or helicopter. it was heading east at a constant slow speed. it was heading east and was hidden behind a third story building. as i was waiting for it to appear on the east side of the building i noticed it was going straight up, it reappeared from behind the 3rd story building and was stationary for approximately 3-4 seconds, at which time it started heading west at a constant slow speed. my feelings were of i could not understand what i was seeing, along with a scary\eerie feeling. as the object started heading west past me, i felt a feeling of sudden alertness and calmness. no longer afraid. the object started heading west, past me, and i suddenly heard a car slam on its breaks at which time i ran back inside.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Juno Beach
